p: Medical records were obtained from the Medical Records Department and reviewed. Medical records and administration of the questionnaire was between 1 st February 2015 till 30 th September 2015. Data acquired included: socio-demographic data, anthropometric measurements, duration of admission, birth history, personal and family history of asthma and atopy, vaccination (which includes prior exposure to pneumococcal and/or influenza vaccines), treatment received (antibiotics and steroids) and clinical, laboratory and radiological investigations.
